frontmatter.title: Eclipse Temurin 8u432, 11.0.25, 17.0.13, 21.0.5 and 23.0.1 Available
frontmatter.description: Adoptium is happy to announce the immediate availability of Eclipse Temurin 8u432, 11.0.25, 17.0.13, 21.0.5 and 23.0.1. As always, all binaries are thoroughly tested and available free of charge without usage restrictions on a wide range of platforms.
frontmatter.author: pmc

frontmatter.title: Eclipse Temurin 23 Available
frontmatter.description: Adoptium is excited to announce the immediate availability of Eclipse Temurin 23.
frontmatter.author: pmc

frontmatter.title: Eclipse Temurin Reproducible Verification Builds for Secure Supply Chain Validation
frontmatter.description: Eclipse Temurin JDK 21+ builds are fully reproducible. This blog explains how third-party users can perform an independent secure verification of an Eclipse Temurin build to validate the integrity of the supply chain, and why you would want to do this.
frontmatter.author: andrewleonard

frontmatter.title: Eclipse Temurin 8u422, 11.0.24, 17.0.12, 21.0.4 and 22.0.2 Available
frontmatter.description: Adoptium is happy to announce the immediate availability of Eclipse Temurin 8u422, 11.0.24, 17.0.12 21.0.4 and 22.0.2 - surpassing April's release as the largest set of platforms published. As always, all binaries are thoroughly tested and available free of charge without usage restrictions on a wide range of platforms.
frontmatter.author: pmc

frontmatter.title: Important Update: Removal of CentOS 7 Eclipse Temurin Images
frontmatter.description: We would like to inform our users that as of the next PSU release on July 16th, Eclipse Temurin images with the CentOS 7 base will be removed.

{"Prebuilt OpenJDK":"预编译 OpenJDK ","Binaries for Free!":"免费下载！","Intro":"Java™ 是世界领先的编程语言和平台。Adoptium 工作推进和支持高质量、TCK 认证的运行时和其相关技术，使其在 Java 生态系统中应用。Eclipse Temurin 是 Adoptium OpenJDK 发行版的名称。"}

{"marketplace.marketplaceDescription":"Java™ 是世界领先的编程语言和平台。Adoptium 工作组推进和支持高质量、TCK 认证, AQAvit 验证的运行时和其相关技术，使其在 Java 生态系统中得以应用。","marketplace.aqavitDescription":"开源测试项目 AQAvit (全称Adoptium Quality Assurance)具体信息可以在<aqavitLink>该链接</aqavitLink>找到. 另外还附有<blogPostLink>博客和简要说明</blogPostLink>阐述了其测试用例以及如何整合到持续部署中。"}

{"release.intro":"Eclipse Temurin 是由基于 OpenJDK 的开源 Java SE 产生的构建版本。Temurin 适用于 <supportedPlatformsLink>广泛的平台</supportedPlatformsLink> 以及诸多 Java SE 版本。以下列出了推荐用于生产的最新版本，并且定期由 Adoptium 社区发布<supportLink>更新和支持</supportLink>。迁移帮助、容器镜像和包安装指南可在<docsLink>文档区</docsLink>获得。","Use the drop-down boxes below to filter the list of current releases.":"使用下面的下拉框过滤当前版本列表 ","Previous releases are available in the Temurin archive.":"以前的版本可从 Temurin 档案中下载","Release Notes":"发行说明"}

{"The Adoptium Working Group":"Adoptium 工作组","wg-description":"Adoptium 工作组推进和支持 Java 生态系统中使用的高质量的运行时和其相关技术。我们的愿景是通过为基于 Java 的应用程序提供运行时来满足 Eclipse 及更广泛的 Java 社区的需求。我们包罗了现有行业标准以及提供对各种硬件和云平台的支持。","View our Members":"工作组成员","Join the Working Group":"加入工作组"}
